solution_line_template: For Mary to have {fewer_sheep_than_bob} sheep fewer than Bob she must own {bob_sheep} - {fewer_sheep_than_bob} = {mary_target_sheep} sheep
As Mary has already {mary_sheep} sheep she must buy {mary_target_sheep} - {mary_sheep} = <<{mary_target_sheep}-{mary_sheep}={sheep_to_buy}>>{sheep_to_buy} sheep
